title: South Florida Integrative Medicine
author: South Florida Integrative Medicine
description: A mental health and wellness practice in Coral Gables that offers clients comprehensive evaluations, therapies, psychoeducational testing, and holistic care.
cleaned_text: Signed in as: filler@godaddy.com Signed in as: filler@godaddy.com South Florida Integrative Medicine is a mental health and wellness practice that offers its patients a variety of psychiatric and psychological therapies, mental health evaluations, psychoeducational assessment services, nutritional counseling, and holistic treatments. Founded in 2013 by husband-and-wife team [Dr. Hugh Humphery](/hugh-humphery-md) and [Reed Haslach Humphery](/reed-humphery), our multi-faceted group practice of doctors and therapists utilizes the most current evidence-based knowledge in the practice of mental health. Our personalized treatment plans are tailored to you. We seek to help you realize your short-term and long-term life goals and achieve an enduring state of wellness. Our group takes a collaborative, team-based approach when working with our patients. This ensures continuity of your care and enables you to benefit from our providers' collective professional expertise. We emphasize the importance of patient education so that you learn the most effective ways to take care of yourself. Located in the City of Coral Gables, we are skilled in treating patients with all conditions and of all ages, from young children to seniors. Our mission is to help our clients successfully achieve an enduring state of optimal mental health and overall wellness in their lives. We are here as a resource of education and support for our diverse community-at-large in South Florida. [Schedule a consultation today](/contact-us) so that we can work together to create a custom plan to optimize your health. We look forward to connecting with you! Update April 2022: Both in-person and Teleheath appointments are available to patients. Usage of face masks are optional in our office in accordance with current CDC guidelines. Actualización de acuerdo con las recomendacione de los CDC. 5915 Ponce De Leon Boulevard, Suite 23, Coral Gables, Florida United States Tel: [786-664-7810](tel:7866647810) / [contact@southfloridaintegrativemed.com](mailto:contact@southfloridaintegrativemed.com) Open today 09:00 am - 05:00 pm Sign up here to receive our periodic newsletter delivered to your mailbox! This website uses cookies. By continuing to use this site, you accept our use of cookies.
